Specs? Xeon E5-1620 servers with 3x2TB SATA HDD in a RAID 1 config. The 3rd drive is reserved for daily backups. Virtualization = OpenVZ. All plans come with 3 cores by default (more upon request), OVH's anti-DDoS mitigation, SolusVM and lots of OS to choose from.

Addons? Extra IPs are $12 / year.

Test IP/files? 192.99.214.79

Is X allowed? See the Terms. Thanks for your interest.
